e-business.translation[0].definitions[0]: electronic business; the practice of selling goods and services and carrying on other business activities by computer, especially over the Internet
E-business processes that rely on an automated information system include, for example, supply chain management, electronic order processing, and handling customer service over the Internet.
e-business.translation[0].definitions[1]: a company that uses the Internet to carry out its business activities or to sell its products or services
Visa created 3-D to help eliminate fraud for both e-businesses and consumers.
